flavor_text_entries.gold:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Upon hearing its
eerie howls, other
POKéMON get the shivers and head
straight back to
their nests.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
The pungent-
smelling flame
that shoots from its mouth results
from toxins burn­
ing in its body.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
In a HOUNDOOM pack, the one with its
horns raked sharply towards the back
serves a leadership role. These POKéMON choose their leader by
fighting amongst themselves.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
In a HOUNDOOM pack, the one with its
horns raked sharply towards the back
serves a leadership role. These POKéMON choose their leader by
fighting amongst themselves.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
In a HOUNDOOM pack, the one with its horns
raked sharply back serves a leadership
role. They choose their leader by fighting
among themselves.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Upon hearing its eerie howls, other
POKéMON get the shivers and head straight
back to their nests.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
If you are burned by the flames it shoots
from its mouth, the pain will never go
away.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Long ago, people imagined
its eerie howls to be the call
of the grim reaper.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Long ago, people imagined
its eerie howls to be the call
of the grim reaper.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The flames it breathes when angry
contain toxins. If they cause a
burn, it will hurt forever.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
If you are burned by the flames
it shoots from its mouth,
the pain will never go away.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Upon hearing its eerie howls, other
Pokémon get the shivers and head
straight back to their nests.

flavor_text_entries.x:
Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be
the call of the grim reaper.
flavor_text_entries.y:
The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins.
If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply
toward the back serves a leadership role. These Pokémon
choose their leader by fighting among themselves.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
In a Houndoom pack, the one with its horns raked sharply
toward the back serves a leadership role. These Pokémon
choose their leader by fighting among themselves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
They spew flames mixed with poison to finish
off their opponents. They divvy up their prey
evenly among the members of their pack.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long
time ago thought it was the grim reaper and
feared it.
